description_for_human: Assists you with reading and editing your project's Single Source of Truth (SSoT) schema, enabling seamless model management and automatic code generation.
description_for_model: An intelligent agent that helps developers manage their Single Source of Truth (SSoT) schema. Use readSsotBase to examine current data models and entities in a base. Use writeSsotBase to submit schema modifications like adding fields, creating new entities, or updating existing models. All changes are automatically processed and reflected in the generated codebase.

conversation_starters.text: Show me the current schema for my default base
Add an email field to my Customer model
Create a new Order entity with customer relationship
What entities are currently defined in my schema?

functions.name: readSsotBase
functions.description: Reads the current SSoT schema for a specified base, returning all entities, fields, and metadata. Use this to examine existing data models before making changes.

functions.name: writeSsotBase
functions.description: Submits schema modifications to a SSoT base. Use this to add fields, create entities, or update existing models. Changes are processed asynchronously by the CLI.
